item.description:
Here are the updated plans!!! Invite your single friends!


Mass Match Singles Night at the Falcons

DATE: Saturday, April 14th

TIME:
Buffet: 5:30 - 6:30 pm -- Meet at: Shakagos Martini Bar, 23 Hampden Street, Springfield) -
for the Mass Match Singles Meet & Greet w/Buffet!

then off to the

Game: 7:00 pm Falcons vs. Providence Bruins ? MassMutual Center, Springfield

-$10 (includes buffet and ticket to the game)

-Contact Chris Thompson at the Falcons office to order tickets:
phone: 413-739-3344 or
email: cthompson@falconsahl.com

-Deadline to order tickets: Thursday, April 12th
you need to contact Chris to get on list and receive the discount
(he can mail them to you or you can pick up)



MassMutual Center
1277 Main St.
Springfield, MA 01103

www.massmutualcenter.com

www.falconsahl.com/

If you have additional questions, feel free to email Vicky at: info.massmatch@comcast.net

group.name: The Western Mass Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Mass Match Singles Night at the Falcon's Game (Hockey)
